description: Assorted metrics for an overview of your cluster

targets.expr: count((kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics", phase!~"Running|Succeeded"} == 1) OR ON(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{job="kube-state-metrics", condition="true"} == 0)) OR vector(0)

count((kube_node_status_condition{job="kube-state-metrics", condition="Ready", status!="true"} == 1) OR ON(node) (kube_node_status_condition{job="kube-state-metrics", condition!="Ready", status="true"} == 1)) OR vector(0)

panels.description: The number of requests handled by kube-apiserver per second, excluding CONNECT, WATCH, and WATCHLIST
panels.title: APIServer Requests

panels.description: The number of requests per second that have taken kube-apiserver more than 3 seconds to handle, excluding CONNECT, WATCH, and WATCHLIST

targets.expr:
rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kubernetes-apiservers", resource!="", group!="", verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH|WATCHLIST", le="+Inf"}[5m])
  - IGNORING(le) rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kubernetes-apiservers", le="3"}[5m])

rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kubernetes-apiservers", resource!="", group="", verb!~"CONNECT|WATCH|WATCHLIST", le="+Inf"}[5m])
  - IGNORING(le) rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kubernetes-apiservers", le="3"}[5m])

panels.title: Slow APIServer Requests

panels.description: The number of requests per second that were handled by kube-apiserver and returned 4xx or 5xx, excluding CONNECT, WATCH, and WATCHLIST
panels.title: Failed APIServer Requests
ETCD Commit to Disk Latency - P99

targets.expr: topk(10, rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubernetes-nodes-cadvisor", pod!="", container!=""}[5m]) / ON(namespace, pod, container) GROUP_LEFT max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) without (node))

topk(10, container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubernetes-nodes-cadvisor", pod!="", container!=""} / ON(namespace, node, pod, container) GROUP_LEFT max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) without (node))

panels.description: The number of items in a Workqueue that are waiting to be processed. This includes Workqueues from any components.
panels.title: Non-empty Workqueues

title: Kubernetes Overview
